titleStmt.title: Haggeus the prophet Where-vnto is added a most plentifull commentary, gathered out of the publique lectures of D. Iohn Iames Gryneus, professor of diuinitie in the Vniuersitie of Basill, and now first published, faithfully translated out of Latin into English, by Christopher Fetherstone student in diuinitie.
Bible. O.T. Haggai. English.
titleStmt.author: Fetherston, Christopher.
Grynaeus, Johann Jacob, 1540-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Iohn Wolfe, for Iohn Harrison the yonger, dwelling in Paternoster-row, at the signe of the Golden Anchor,

notesStmt.note: Last leaf bears woodcut coat of arms on recto.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: Paternoster-row, at the signe of the Golden Anchor
